lead_paragraph: SOLOMON--Seymour, son of the late Tillie and Max Solomon, brother of the late Herbert and Henry, died on February 1, 2016 at the age of 93. Devoted husband of Ruth for 64 loving years. Beloved father of Marc and Raquel and daughter-in-law Nancy. Adoring grandfather of Eric. A 1943 graduate of CCNY with a Master's Degree in Social Work from NYU. Former Assistant Commissioner of Probation for the City of New York. Wonderful, loyal and generous to family and friends. We will love you and miss you always. 1/3
